name: market for furnace, logs, 6kW | furnace, logs, 6kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21735/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the market for 'furnace, logs, 6kW' in Switzerland. It is assumed that for these small and mobile type of furnace the Swiss market is primarily supplied by domestic producers, requiring a Swiss market activity.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a small log furnace that is used for room heating.  It has a capacity of 6 kW, a lifetime of 20 years and a lifetime capacity of 1,051,200 kWh. This category includes wood-fired cooking stoves, tiled and closed fireplaces and fireplace stoves of modern design, which serve as auxiliary heating or heating of a room. It is assumed that the furnace operates 1000 hours a year. The process includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the furnace, their end-of-life, land use, energy and heat for the construction.  

The activity starts withe the furnace leaving the factory gate.

The activity ends with the delivery of the furnace at the use site.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

Transport estimates according to the ecoinvent default transport model for Switzerland: Valsasina, L. (2016) Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent database version 3.3, ecoinvent, Zürich, Switzerland.
